meaningMnemonic: What can you see in the <kanji>north</kanji> that looks like a <kanji>ladle</kanji> and is made up of <kanji>seven</kanji> <kanji>star</kanji>s? That's the group of stars we call <vocabulary>the Big Dipper</vocabulary> or, depending on where you are in the world, perhaps <vocabulary>the Plough</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji.
